author: AP
title: Member of Chargers organization tests positive for virus
description: At least one member of the Los Angeles Chargers organization has tested positive for the coronavirus and two others have reported symptoms
content:
COSTA MESA, Calif. (AP) — At least one member of the Los Angeles Chargers organization has tested positive for the coronavirus and two others have reported symptoms.
Team spokesman Josh Rupprecht said in a statement that “everyone is doing well and is on the… [+795 chars]
